name: HomeRemedies
0:
”Alexa, ask home remedies for headache”
”Alexa, Open Home Remedies.”
”Alexa, ask Home Remedies remedy for cold”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home remedies
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The home remedies is a skill which can be used to find the home remedies for all the common diseases like cough, cold, fever, acidity etc. It doesn't treat any medical emergency.

Disclaimer : 
This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis.
Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

This doesn't provide life-saving assistance for any emergency kindly visit you Doctor.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
